answers.answer: hey. i don't think there's any direct side effects. but if you're using, it will most likely lead your diabetes downhill. when i was using ecstasy i stopped caring about managing it, didn't test my blood and started skipping injections. something i really regret.i hope you don't go down that road.keep posting.good luck
Is using have any drastic changes to your diabetes?

question: What are the dangerous side effects from using crystal meth when you are a type 1 diabetic?
